description: The City of Chicago Tax Increment Financing (TIF) Portal provides Chicagoans with a map-based view of TIF districts and projects. Tan areas show TIF district boundaries. It details the funding approved amount at the project level and gives a depiction of developer scope information.

It details the funding approved amount at the project level and gives a depiction of developer scope information.

name: Tax Increment Financing (TIF) Projects
